mutants.code:
def longest_subarray_less_than_or_equal_to_k(a, n, k):
    left = 1
    right = 0
    max_length = 0
    current_sum = 0
    while right < n:
        current_sum += a[right]
        right += 1
        while current_sum > k:
            current_sum -= a[left]
            left += 1
        max_length = max(max_length, right - left)
    return max_length

    left = -1

            left += 1
        max_length = max(max_length, right - left)
    return max_length
